## Data import

### Import Stata
```
library(foreign)

mydata <- read.dta("filename")
```

Export via Excel

### Import Excel
```
library(readxl)

data <- read_excel("", sheet = "sheetname", col_names = TRUE, skip = 0)

```

Export
```
library(xlsx)
write.xlsx(mydata100, file = "test", sheetName = "sheet", 
  col.names=TRUE, row.names=TRUE, append=FALSE, showNA=TRUE)  
```
